noun.description: Long, loud piercing cries expressing extreme emotion or pain.
examples: neighbors heard screaming and shouting and decided to dial 911

adjective.description: Giving a long, loud, piercing cry or cries.
examples: a harassed parent with a screaming child

adjective.description: Highly obvious or startling in effect.
examples: the screaming headlines raise fear levels
we used plywood and painted it screaming yellow
